programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1758
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Monday (M) Ep368
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her father’s death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late father’s hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Mari Hirakawa inherits her father’s dojo after his death but wants to sell it as she does not want to run the karate practice. For her plan to succeed, she has to take on a bet with his father’s ex-student and compete in a martial arts competition that will change her life.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: Wallace, an old gang member, is tasked to kill the son of a mob boss, Robert. Gathering his team for the job, the six of them set out to hunt Robert down. However, when the mission goes horribly wrong, Wallace later finds out that it was all a set-up to flush out a mole in his team…

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: After “Golden Chickenesss”, this is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Wolf Warrior II
programme.desc: In this action-packed sequel to the 2015 blockbuster hit, China’s deadliest Special Forces operative, Leng Feng (Wu Jing), returns into action when he crosses paths with a sadistic band of mercenaries terrorizing innocent civilians.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow III
programme.desc: In this prequel, young Mark heads to Saigon to find his cousin Mun and meets a female gang leader Kit, who teaches him gun skills. Kit falls for Mark but Mark knows Mun also loves her so he did not reciprocate her love. The return of Kit’s ex-boyfriend brings this love triangle to a head after he bombs Mun’s garage, forcing her to sort things out.

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: Bai Xing Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel located in Qian Dao Lake, Hang Zhou, with a service level only worthy of a four-star hotel. The head office sent Cruella Koo, a tough executive, to lead reforms for the hotel and upgrade the employees’ performance to reach the five-star level.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: The former SWAT captain, Dong Gu, suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: Our Time Will Come
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, Fan Lan accidentally helps to rescue the writer Mao Dun and is recruited to join the anti-Japanese guerrilla. In order to protect Fan Lan, her mother takes Fan Lan’s place to relay military intelligence but was arrested. Fan Lan must now seek help from her ex-boyfriend who works for the Japanese…

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: The former SWAT captain, Dong Gu, suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster…

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Paws-Men
programme.desc: When a dog is in need of rescue, the Paws-Men assemble to save the dog like Batman. “Paws-Men” tells the story of four men rescuing dogs and the many difficulties that they encounter, from a dog eatery to bullies and a dog abusing granny. Despite the hardships, Paws-Men give us a peek into the true friendships between dogs and humans.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the world’s best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the world’s top detective got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun…

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar known as 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and tries to steal a diamond from a rich man’s party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chief’s granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70’s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister’s magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: In attempting to rescue some innocent people, swordsman Chiang Tzu-chao (Fang Mien) slays the son of Tsao Kang (Wang Hsia), leader of the ruthless Crimson Charm gang.The enraged father promises vengeance on the day of Chiang's 60th birthday...

programme.title: Lady Of Steel
programme.desc: A young swordswoman Fang Ying Qi sets out to join the Flying Dragon Clan in their defense against the invading Jin forces. Fang also intends to avenge the murder of her parents by bandit leader Han 20 years ago. Han has since taken on a false identity as a member of the Flying Dragon Clan and Fang must rely on her deadly sword skills to stop Han.

programme.title: The Web of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called “Five Poison Web”, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit’s camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader’s wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government’s secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor’s ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family’s young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo’s stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fiancé to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yen’s property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love…

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all the disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone in the temple except five Shaolin disciples. To take revenge on the Qing’s, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become “The Five Shaolin Masters”.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: Constantly being abused by her cruel husband, the frail Chan Sau Ying awaits death from tuberculosis. The new servant girl Yi Wah, takes pity on her mistress’ plight and the pair proceed to drown him one evening. They dump his body in a nearby pond but Sau Ying believes that the man’s bloated corpse has risen from the bog to seek vengeance.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: The ship of pirate Chang Pao-Chai (Ti Lung) springs a leak after an otherwise successful raid on a foreign ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch his ship up, where he encounters corrupt Qing officials and poor, oppressed peasants. Being a good man at heart, he decides to help out and becomes an even bigger outlaw in the process.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family’s objection, so Hong’s maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung’s house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung’s mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: The subtle repackage of the most filmed Ching Dynasty novel, The Dream Of The Red Chamber by renowned director Li Han-hsiang has earned public acclaim by attaining The Best Art Direction of The 15th Golden Horse Award, The Best Costume and The Best Art Direction Of The 24th Asian Film Festival. Brigitte Lin and Sylvia Chang play the adorable yet sorrowful couple Bao Yu and Dai Yu; playing their roles to the hilt in this gloomy love story of their uncontrollable destinies.

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu
programme.desc: Aravind unexpectedly loses his beloved girlfriend in a car accident. The strangest thing happens after the accident when people around him tell him no such person ever existed.

programme.title: Maragadha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Naan Sirithal
programme.desc: Gandhi, who suffers from Pseudobulbar, finds his life turned upside down when he gets in trouble with Dilli Babu, a gangster.
Dr.Vaseegaran is forced to reassemble Chitti in order to stop a deadly winged monster.

programme.title: Kallan
programme.desc: Velu, a man who belongs to a family of hunters, comes up with an illegal way to make good money when the government puts a ban on hunting as a profession.

programme.title: Oru Pakka Kathai
programme.desc: The marriage of Meera, a college student, and her boyfriend Saravanan has been approved by the family. But the condition is as after a job after graduation. But when Meera becomes pregnant, the whole story gets upside down

programme.title: Adhe Kangal
programme.desc: Varun Murali, a blind chef and owner of a restaurant, falls in love with his customer Deepa. However, his life takes an unusual turn after he realises the truth about her.

programme.title: Dikkilona
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Soodhu Kavvum
programme.desc: Das, with his team, kidnap Arumai, son of a politician, who has been planning his own kidnapping to extract money from his father. Problems arise, when an insane cop is brought to handle the case.

programme.title: Karnan
programme.desc: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

programme.title: Anandam Vilayudum Veedu
programme.desc: While Muthupandi and Kaasi, two half-brothers, lead harmonious lives with their large families, their formidable unity is threatened by the evil scheme of an old nemesis.

programme.title: Irumbu Thirai
programme.desc: A military officer borrows money from a bank using fake papers for his sister's marriage. However, when the money goes missing from his account, he begins an investigation that leads him to a hacker.

programme.title: Miruga
programme.desc: Forest officials in Kotagiri hunt a man-eating tiger that is attacking innocent people. At the same time, a serial killer is on the prowl for wealthy single women.

programme.title: Salim (2.5 Hrs)
programme.desc: Salim, a doctor, runs into trouble for being too generous towards his patients. Soon, his patience with the justice system snaps and he takes the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Adhe Kangal
programme.desc: Varun Murali, a blind chef and owner of a restaurant, falls in love with his customer Deepa. However, his life takes an unusual turn after he realises the truth about her.

programme.title: Sreekaram
programme.desc: Karthik, a young IT professional, works in a reputed firm and earns a hefty salary. However, he soon quits his job in order to pursue farming and promote agriculture among the youth.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Run Raja Run
programme.desc: A cheated police officer who has been involved in a scam by his co-officer, goes to jail. His son seeks revenge with an extremely thrilling plan along with his friend.

programme.title: Kabadadhari
programme.desc: A passionate traffic police who is bored of his routine job stumbles across some skeletons which ignite his soulless life. When he probes into the case he comes across a cop who had investigated the case in the past.

programme.title: Kolamaavu Kokila
programme.desc: Kokila, who has financial issues, gets involved in a drug racket to earn quick money. Eventually, her family also gets dragged in the internal drug war which, in turn, puts their lives at risk.

programme.title: Bow Bow
programme.desc: Sanju, a little boy, adopts different methods to train his lazy dog. His world, however, comes crashing down when he loses the dog.

programme.title: Rekka
programme.desc: Shiva, who is known for helping couples elope, is forced to kidnap a politician's daughter by a gangster, David, after he stops his wedding to a girl who did not want to marry him.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep65
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep41
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep42
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep30
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep08
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior

programme.desc: Ikendu, a Malian immigrant, falls in love with Patricia in an Italian-speaking town of Switzerland. When he is falsely accused of drug dealing by corrupt policemen, the couple’s relationship is put to the test as they discover each other’s secrets.

programme.title: Flying Fish
programme.desc: Through three different but interconnected stories, we follow three young characters – a young girl, a lovelorn woman and a widow, mother of eight children - and their painful personal journeys set against the backdrop of the Sri Lankan Civil War.

programme.title: A Summer in Croatia
programme.desc: Ena’s fiancé cancels the planned wedding - but just then she learns that she has a family in Croatia. At the sea, under the southern sun, she not only meets her loving grandmother but also a hostile sister-in-law and a romantically inclined fisherman.

programme.title: Almanya-Willkommen in Deutschland
programme.desc: A migrant Turkish family living in Almanya, Germany struggles with the question: what is really “home” as they decide to return to Turkey? As they reminisce, quarrel, and reconcile, the journey takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Picket Fences
programme.desc: Kenan, a reclusive Turkish widower, lives beside Lissi, a happy-go-lucky landlady. Both rarely see eye to eye with one another. But when Kenan’s kids embark on a mission to get their father a new woman, things take an unexpected comedic turn.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Lost Souls Of Vienna
programme.desc: When Haller’s sister, Sophie, is abducted by a ruthless gang, he decides to pursue them without involving the police. Together with his assistant, Niko, they expertly use their wits and intelligence to outsmart the criminals and bring Sophie to safety.

programme.title: We Look The Same
programme.desc: In this witty short about racial and culture crises, a French-born Chinese store assistant is faced with a conundrum. A Chinese tourist needs to use the store’s restroom but that’s against the rules. Is compassion worth the risk of losing one’s job?

programme.title: Joy of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Girl In Flight
programme.desc: 11-year-old Silvia decides to fulfill her dream of visiting Rome by running away from home. She befriends Emina, a Roma girl, on the train ride there, and embarks on an adventure with her through the city to her gypsy camp.

programme.title: Leander's Final Journey
programme.desc: In this drama about reconciling the past with the present and the power of hope, a former WWII officer travels to Ukraine with his granddaughter to find the only woman he ever loved - just as a new war breaks out in the former Soviet Union in 2014.

programme.title: What You Don't Know About Me
programme.desc: Ikendu, a Malian immigrant, falls in love with Patricia in an Italian-speaking town of Switzerland. When he is falsely accused of drug dealing by corrupt policemen, the couple’s relationship is put to the test as they discover each other’s secrets.

programme.title: A Summer in Croatia

programme.title: Picket Fences

programme.title: Gold Runner
programme.desc: After getting robbed, Reza loses his job delivering gold from workshops to jewellery stores. Together with his friend, Reza devises a plan to get back on his feet by finding a legendary diamond at the bottom of an enormous septic tank.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Lost Souls Of Vienna
programme.desc: When Haller’s sister, Sophie, is abducted by a ruthless gang, he decides to pursue them without involving the police. Together with his assistant, Niko, they expertly use their wits and intelligence to outsmart the criminals and bring Sophie to safety.

programme.title: My Beautiful Country
programme.desc: Kosovo, 1999. The young Serbian widow Danica gives refuge to an injured Albanian soldier despite knowing that it would endanger her family. A love, one that defies ethnic antagonism and embodies resilience, blossoms between them like a flower in a drought.

programme.title: We Look The Same
programme.desc: In this witty short about racial and culture crises, a French-born Chinese store assistant is faced with a conundrum. A Chinese tourist needs to use the store’s restroom but that’s against the rules. Is compassion worth the risk of losing one’s job?

programme.title: Joy of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Hostage in Manila
programme.desc: When two German tourists are kidnapped in the Philippines, the State Department has no choice but to send firebrand Karla Lorenz, who tends to go it alone - but at least she gets the job done, even if it means risking her own life.

programme.title: Girl In Flight
programme.desc: 11-year-old Silvia decides to fulfill her dream of visiting Rome by running away from home. She befriends Emina, a Roma girl, on the train ride there, and embarks on an adventure with her through the city to her gypsy camp.

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Married couple, Luca and Susi, are facing problems at work and they struggle to support their family of four. When Mary, their new au pair arrives, her presence lights up the dull household and her beauty captivates the lovestruck Luca and his son.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Fire Devil Of Vienna
programme.desc: The charred remains of the principal of a boarding school is found. Blind ex-cop Haller goes undercover to infiltrate the community and tries to discover its dark secrets. To make things more complicated, he unexpectedly falls for his beautiful co-worker.

programme.title: Love Suddenly
programme.desc: Still hung up on his teenage sweetheart Marie, Jakob sets out to win her back. However, she is under the mistaken impression that he is more successful than he actually is. Soon, Jakob finds himself in a web of lies he cannot escape from.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas – jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 21
programme.desc: The bidders take a trip to Canyon Country to bid on huge trailers. A mysterious concrete block and a trailer full of hay mean big opportunities and lead to unusual alliances within the group.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Born as an 80-year-old man in New Orleans just after World War I, Benjamin Button proceeds to grow younger as time passes. And unable to stop time like any other man, Benjamin experiences life and love oddly out of sync with the rest of humanity. This Academy Award winning film is a time traveller's tale of the people and places Benjamin encounters, the loves he loses and finds, as well as the joys of life and the sadness of death and what lasts beyond time.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2 6
programme.desc: An unexpected trio emerges in the mission to take down Cortés, as Arman and Nadia’s relationship hits a breaking point. Fiona attempts to keep her family safe.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 13
programme.desc: Sheldon worries his comfortable lifestyle is preventing him from achieving scientific progress so he asks his friends to make him miserable.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 14
programme.desc: When an online bully destroys Leonard and Sheldon's physics paper, the guys band together to take him down.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 15
programme.desc: Howard receives some shocking news as everyone prepares for the reopening of Stuart's comic book store, and Penny teaches Sheldon how to "let it go."

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 16
programme.desc: When the gang hears about an experiment designed to make participants fall in love, Sheldon and Penny put it to the test as a joke.

programme.title: Stargirl S3 9
programme.desc: DC's STARGIRL follows high school sophomore Courtney Whitmore as she inspires an unlikely group of young heroes to stop the villains of the past.

programme.title: Godzilla: King Of The Monsters
programme.desc: The story follows the heroic efforts of the crypto-zoological agency Monarch as its members face off against a battery of god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah. When these ancient super-species—thought to be mere myths—rise again, they all vie for supremacy, leaving humanity’s very existence hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner unearths a long buried secret...

programme.title: The Winchesters S1 4
programme.desc: After the details of a veteran’s death don’t add up, Carlos brings everyone in to investigate and he shares a detail about his past that makes John see him in a new light.

programme.title: The Mentalist S7 02
programme.desc: Lisbon goes undercover in prison to bust a car theft ring.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 1
programme.desc: In the wealthy, seaside community of Neptune, the rich and powerful make the rules. They own the town and the high school, and they desperately try to keep their dirty little secrets just that...secret. Unfortunately for them, there's Veronica Mars (series star KRISTEN BELL), a smart, fearless 17-year-old apprentice private investigator dedicated to solving the town's toughest mysteries.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 2
programme.desc: Veronica and Wallace don't believe in the evidence against Weevil, who has been arrested for stealing credit card applications from Logan's family, and launch an investigation to help their new ally. Meanwhile, after joining Ms. Mallory Dent's (series star SYDNEY TAMIIA POITIER) journalism class, Veronica clashes with socialite Caitlin Ford (PARIS HILTON - "The Simple Life 2"), Logan's sexy new girlfriend. The young investigator is intrigued by the attention shown to her by another wealthy student, Troy Vandegraff (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), a friend of her ex-boyfriend Duncan. Later, Veronica learns that Lilly got a ticket while driving her car on the day she died--two hours after her supposed time of death.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 4
programme.desc: In an effort to help Wallace's new friend, Georgia (KYLA PRATT), who was duped out of her money in an Internet scheme, Veronica must outwit a group of computer "thugs," known as the Silicon Mafia. Meanwhile, Keith makes Veronica introduce him to her new boyfriend, Troy (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), before allowing her to go to the homecoming dance with him. Later, Logan helps Duncan edit together a memorial video for a school dedication ceremony marking the one-year anniversary of Lilly's death.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 5
programme.desc: Veronica tries to help her new boyfriend, Troy (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), find his father's stolen car and turns to Weevil for assistance. But the situation becomes dangerous when she discovers that Logan and Troy's buddy might have leftmore than a piñata in the car after their night in Tijuana. While Keith has accepted that his wife is gone and begins dating school guidance counselor Rebecca James (recurring guest star PAULA MARSHALL), Veronica continues to secretly investigateher mother's whereabouts, leading her to stumble on a secret her mom was keeping.

programme.desc: Life As We Know It Grey's Anatomy's Katherine Heigl and Transformers' Josh Duhamel play polar opposites Holly and Eric. After a disastrous first date, the only thing they have in common is their dislike for each other and their love for their goddaughter, Sophie. But when they suddenly become all Sophie has in the world, they are forced to put their differences aside. Juggling career ambitions and competing social calendars, they'll have to find some common ground while living under one roof-- and deal with life as we know it. Directed by Greg Berlanti (Brothers and Sisters, Dawson's Creek), this romantic drama also features Mad Men's Christina Hendricks and more.

The Captain's (Gavin MacLeod) godson (Grant Goodeve) brings his wife (Bess Armstrong) on the cruise for a belated honeymoon, because he was called to military service and was away for two years. programme.desc: Nurse Doctor - Father Mulcahy has been spending a lot of time with Lt. Gail Harris, a new nurse at the 4077th. Mulcahy has been helping Gail in her studies for the medical boards and encouraging her in her endeavors to become a doctor. Meanwhile, the rest of the unit is growing more and more concerned about the dwindling water supply. An uncomfortable moment occurs when Father Mulcahy is conducting a study session with Gail and she makes amorous advances towards him, thinking that his friendliness was something more. The young lieutenant is made even more uncomfortable by Hot Lips’ cool demeanor towards her and she asks Col. Potter for a transfer. Colonel Potter finds the root of the problem and makes arrangements so that Gal can continue with her medical studies and feel comfortable in her surroundings.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep08
programme.desc: Private Finance - Money is the source of all trouble for Hawkeye and Klinger lately. Hawkeye promises a soldier on his deathbed that he will make sure the G.I.’s family will receive money he has willed to them; the only problem is that the soldier made the money through illegal means. Meanwhile Klinger offers money to aid a young Korean woman which is misinterpreted by the girl's mother. Hawkeye continues to grapple with his own conscience versus keeping his word. Klinger finally overcomes the language barrier with the girl’s mother; when she finds that his intentions towards her daughter were honorable everyone breathes a sigh of relief.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep175
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.desc: It Seems Ringo’s Worked Up The Courage To Become A Hunter! - Tsukasa and Ringo are told to take some time off before they collapse from exhaustion due to their hectic schedules.

programme.desc: The Wiping Of The Disciple’s Butt - A badly wounded Garou is cornered by Silverfang and is attacked mercilessly by him. He starts to lose consciousness.

programme.title: Mitsuboshi Colors Ep1

programme.title: Gintama Season 1 Ep43
programme.desc: Make Characters So Anybody Can Tell Who They Are By Just Their Silhouettes / Since It Ended A Bit Early, We'Re Starting The Next One - Kagura chooses to stay in Edo. After she is back to Snack Otose, she peeps from the window outside to see her friends.

programme.title: Gintama Season 1 Ep44

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Never Trust A Stranger - The team welcomes a new member, Special Agent Tiffany Wallace, as they search for killers who orchestrated a mass shooting at a media company, and OA’s personal connection with the case threatens to cloud his judgement.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Unreasonable Doubt - The team races to stop an active serial killer after three women are found weighted down at the bottom of a lake, and Jubal looks into an old closed case after there are multiple similarities to the recent victims.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Liar's Poker - When the leader of a drug cartel and one of the world’s most wanted men, Antonio Vargas , is apprehended by the team, the entire FBI headquarters is put at risk when his henchmen unveil a terroristic threat to free him.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Crazy Love - A shooting at a quinceañera leaves two dead, but the team believes they may not have been the intended targets.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Clean Slate - As the team searches for a young girl who was kidnapped from a cabin during a family vacation, they discover that the abduction may be tied to a skeleton in her family’s closet.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Uncovered - The team must infiltrate a drug trafficking gang after the robbery of a chemical plant leaves two customs agents dead. Also, Nestor (Josh Segarra) offers his help on the case, giving Maggie new insight into his character

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Discord - An experience on the job has new agent Tiffany Wallace examining the tension between her career as an FBI special agent and the responsibility she feels to her community as a black woman.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Walk The line - After a bomb leaves three people dead, the team presses a reluctant informant to gather information from his close friends who are under suspicion.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Leverage - When a political reporter is kidnapped and held without a ransom demand, the team must dig into her past relationships in order to pin down her assailant's motive.

programme.title: FBI S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Checks And Balances - The team must track down two assailants who wear animal masks while committing armed robberies, with the latest leaving an off-duty 26 Fed security guard dead.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep4
programme.desc: A whistle stop tour of some of Canada's most iconic foods.

programme.title: Pangolins: The World's Most Wanted Animal
programme.desc: Nature documentary following the efforts to save the pangolin, a little-known scaly mammal with an unfortunate tagline - they are the world's most illegally trafficked animals.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Deep South - The Deep South is a formidable place to live. Cold fronts from Antarctica batter the wildlife, flora and people, and all are shaped by their environment; bending but seldom broken.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Megawave - Nazaré in Portugal is the site of the biggest ocean waves ever recorded on Earth. To understand what creates these monsters, plunge beneath the waves to reveal the sprawling landscapes of the seabed, travel to South Africa to witness the Sardine Run, capture a circular rainbow at Victoria Falls and chase tornados in the American Midwest.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Argentina - Robson's adventure concludes as he journeys into the wilderness of Argentina, on the hunt for a peculiar fish called the Pacu.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - Life in the Furnace Ep2
programme.desc: It’s October in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Niño event… the Valley is in the throes of drought. There’s been no rain since April and desperate animals are drawn to the only remaining source of water in the Valley – the dwindling Luangwa River. The last remaining deep pools are inhabited by hippos – hundreds squashed together in the only water deep enough to submerge them. As tempers flare and skirmishes break out, it’s a dangerous place for baby hippos, dwarfed by the three-tonne adults.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Coming of the Rains Ep3
programme.desc: The rains are late. It is the most brutal time of year. Babies born into drought face starvation. Everything is desperate for rain. When it arrives, it is a downpour on an enormous scale. Alien creatures emerge into a different world. The wet season begins.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - USA Ep9
programme.desc: The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - Winter is Coming Ep1
programme.desc: As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where it’s warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - Life in the Furnace Ep2
programme.desc: It’s October in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Niño event… the Valley is in the throes of drought. There’s been no rain since April and desperate animals are drawn to the only remaining source of water in the Valley – the dwindling Luangwa River. The last remaining deep pools are inhabited by hippos – hundreds squashed together in the only water deep enough to submerge them. programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Coming of the Rains Ep3
programme.desc: The rains are late. It is the most brutal time of year. Babies born into drought face starvation. Everything is desperate for rain. When it arrives, it is a downpour on an enormous scale. Alien creatures emerge into a different world. The wet season begins.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Invisible World Ep3
programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we can’t see, sound we can’t hear and even stranger forces we can’t begin to detect.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 - Sweeping Shores Ep1
programme.desc: The African intertidal zone is home to a unique universe of plants and creatures. Here, life has adapted to survive in a challenging marine environment - some species are able to live on exposed rocks, while others prefer the shelter of rock pools.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 - Sanctuary of the Indian Ocean Ep2
programme.desc: On Africa's east coast, the warm Agulhas run south with a distinctive subtropical landscape. Made up of everything from mangrove swamps to colorful coral reefs, the area has marine turtles - who breed on long and warm sandy beaches - and a recently found population of "living fossils", the Coelacanth, which dwell in deep, submarine canyons.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Europe Ep10
programme.desc: From the Highlands to the Alps, Europe’s evocative landscapes are the backdrop for epic wildlife drama. Normally stoic red deer go wild during the rut. Wolf packs clash over territory, and foxes do the foxtrot - it’s not as nice as it sounds.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Drought Begins Ep1
programme.desc: The Luangwa Valley in Zambia experiences one of the toughest dry seasons imaginable. Seven months with no rain and spiraling temperatures. And with this year’s El Nino conditions the drought is threatening to be even more intense than usual.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - Life in the Furnace Ep2
programme.desc: It’s October in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Niño event… the Valley is in the throes of drought. programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - South Africa Ep11
programme.desc: Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism. It all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Sub Sahara Ep12
programme.desc: The latitudes south of the Sahara offer vastly different battlegrounds for a wide range of warriors. Male giraffes swing their heads like wrecking balls, zebras boast the most powerful kick in the animal kingdom, and chimpanzee warfare is eerily familiar.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Lemur Spirit Ep1
programme.desc: This is the story of a day in the life of an Indris Family following a mother, father, and their three offspring around their home in the rainforest of Mantadia National Park in Madagascar.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Castaway Island Ep2
programme.desc: This film travels around the island visiting some of its most striking landscapes to explore how Madagascar’s species have evolved over time. Madagascar is a strangely beautiful and unique world with a staggering array of habitats and special landscapes.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Madagascar in Cold Blood Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the lives of Madagascar’s cold-blooded creatures. Chameleons, frog, lizards, and snakes have all adapted in order to survive on the island. We take a look at how they find food, reproduce, and avoid predators.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Gardens in the Clouds Ep2
programme.desc: The ancient plants and animals of the Cloud Mountains of South Africa have long captured people’s imagination. It’s a landscape defined by weather and threatened by invaders. But these mountains are not only a sanctuary for life in the present; they also offer a fascinating window into our past.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Monkey Diaries Ep3
programme.desc: Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europe’s birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - January-February - the Year Begins Ep1
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earth’s axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - May-June - a Time of Volatility Ep3
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - South Africa Ep11
programme.desc: Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism. It all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - May-June - a Time of Volatility Ep3
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 - Golden Forest Ep3
programme.desc: This is the story of the “Golden Forest”, the vast expanses of kelp that lines Africa’s southwestern shore. Fed by an upwelling of nutrients from deep in the Atlantic, the kelp forest nurtures four distinct worlds.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 - Algoa Bay: Last Refuge of the African Penguin Ep4
programme.desc: The population of African penguins in Southern Africa is on the decline, but the charismatic species has found a stronghold on two islands in Algoa Bay. This is the story of the penguins’ daily struggle to raise families in an unforgiving and hostile environment.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Sub Sahara Ep12
programme.desc: The latitudes south of the Sahara offer vastly different battlegrounds for a wide range of warriors. Male giraffes swing their heads like wrecking balls, zebras boast the most powerful kick in the animal kingdom, and chimpanzee warfare is eerily familiar.

programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earth’s axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - May-June - a Time of Volatility Ep3
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Stinkers Ep1
programme.desc: In nature, the right stench can mean the difference between life or death. Meet nature's odor-equipped inhabitants, from vomiting grasshoppers to dung-flinging hippos, and even a flower that's adapted to smell like death.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Winged Weirdos Ep2
programme.desc: One uses a mustache to attract mates and another has a bill so big, it needs special vertebrae to carry it. Learn how nature's flying iconoclasts have evolved their appearance in order to survive.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - The Road to Independence Ep4
programme.desc: As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - Trouble in Paradise Ep3
programme.desc: Relaxing among the ancient temples of Sri Lanka, tufted grey langurs share their territory with a troop of toque macaques and a group of purple face leaf monkeys. This is primate paradise. But a crippling drought changes everything. The three species are forced to adapt and take risks.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - Life in the Furnace Ep2
programme.desc: It’s October in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Niño event… the Valley is in the throes of drought. There’s been no rain since April and desperate animals are drawn to the only remaining source of water in the Valley – the dwindling Luangwa River. The last remaining deep pools are inhabited by hippos – hundreds squashed together in the only water deep enough to submerge them. As tempers flare and skirmishes break out, it’s a dangerous place for baby hippos, dwarfed by the three-tonne adults.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clan’s symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkat’s alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat’s strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - Life in the Furnace Ep2
programme.desc: It’s October in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Niño event… the Valley is in the throes of drought. programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - The Wild Web Ep7
programme.desc: In Zambia, no single creature survives in isolation. From lions and leopards to jumping spiders and bee-eating mantises, study the diverse network of animals and plants that makes the Luangwa Valley one of the most magical wildernesses in Africa.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Hippo Lagoon Ep1
programme.desc: Secluded and sheltered, away from the hustle and bustle of Zambia’s Luangwa River, Kasikizi lagoon is home to a small community of diverse wildlife. At the height of the wet season, it’s full to the brim with water – a peaceful spot, ideal for two old male hippos who wallow in its watery depths. The lagoon is their sanctuary, a world away from the more violent life they’ve left behind at the main river, where they had to face aggressive beachmasters, willing to fight to protect their territory...

programme.title: Trip Flip S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Las Vegas - A couple says yes to Bert Kriescher and gets their trip flipped to Vegas.

programme.title: Rob Riggle: Global Investigator S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Mystery Of The Ok Corral - Most people know about Wyatt Earp and the shootout at the O.K. Corral but only Rob Riggle knows that this is directly connected to the lost treasure of Skeleton Canyon.

programme.title: 36 Hours S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Quirky Portland - Kristen Kish and Kyle Martino travel to the weird, wild and wacky city of Portland, Oregon.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands S1 Ep3

programme.title: Mysterious Islands S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Island Where Women Rule - Kellee travels to South Korea's Jeju Island to look into the mysterious reason it's known as the "island of dominant women."

programme.title: Alien Highway S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Missouri Mayhem - A series of recent UFO sightings brings Chuck Zukowski 's team to Missouri, the home of the 1973 Piedmont lights incident. Is history repeating itself?

programme.title: Cooper's Treasure S2 Ep7

programme.title: Bigfoot: Fear In The Woods

programme.title: Ufo Witness S2 Ep2

programme.title: Bert The Conqueror S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Alaska - The biggest and best outhouse race is on tap at the Rondy Fest in Alaska, as Bert races his outhouse down the slippery and icy roads.

programme.title: Bert The Conqueror S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Arizona - Bert is in Arizona to compete in a chariot race. To win this race, Bert will have to successfully maneuver an ostrich strapped to his chariot.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep17
programme.desc: Trolly Tales 2 / Rainbowmageddon - The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep18
programme.desc: Coop, Where'S My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep18
programme.desc: What Screams May Come/Grunt Anything - Eep joins the Scream-Leading team and starts picking up characteristics of her coach, Meep, much to Ugga's chagrin/Meep kicks Snoot out of the cave for not being a brave hunter. The Croods reluctantly take Snoot in and try to make him into a hunter to get him out of their home.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep19
programme.desc: There Will Be Eggs/I Think We'Re Alone Meow - Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Bud and Crud try to corner the egg market/Gran takes in a group of crabby tabbies, and uses their combined crabbiness to get whatever she wants. Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep43
programme.desc: Prey Time - When the Senior Puss Squad is in trouble and needs his help, Puss is alone in the woods trying to survive an unknown assassin's dangerous attack

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep44
programme.desc: Breaking Good - When Dulcinea sets up a school to teach unruly thieves how to be good, Uli takes the idea too far and it's up to Puss to make San Lorenzo normal

programme.desc: Not Lout - When Snotlout screws up a mission, he must learn to be a leader and earn the trust of the other riders.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Rupert And The Rainbow - It's a colourful Nutwood when Rupert and Ping Pong try to use the Rainbow to paint pictures with.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Rupert And The Toy Soldiers - When Ping Pong's spell to fix a broken toy Soldier goes wrong Rupert and his friends need help from an unexpected source to get him back in the box.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep15
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo Slips Up - Raa Raa and the other animals keep slipping up on banana skins that are littering the jungle floor. Where could they have come from? Together the animals clear up the mess and discover who has been littering the jungle with banana skins.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep16
programme.desc: No Sleep Til Bedtime - It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub…

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep15
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bouncing Bulb - Pat's Special Delivery is a very large, very fragile lighthouse bulb, and everything seems to be conspiring to make him break it! Falling timber, an out of control sofa, Bonnie the dog, high winds...! Pat's journey from the sorting office to Pencaster Bay is a minefield of hazards. Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. Out at sea are Alf and PC Selby, enjoying a day's fishing, until they drift off-course and need the lighthouse to guide them ashore...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep67
programme.desc: Pirate Primrose - The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep68
programme.desc: Primrose Loses It - Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Super Paul - Dennis persuades Pieface that Paul is an undercover super hero! Gnasher, JJ and Rubi must go along with the story and help Dennis to 'prove it'. However, his genius plan comes to a sticky end, when Pieface begins to think that with Paul at his side, he is completely invincible!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Wonder Sausage - Wonder Sausage The world famous Wonder Sausage is on show in Butch Butcher's shop. Walter realises the sausage has a strange hypnotic effect on Gnasher so uses it to make him follow his every whim! Dennis can't understand why Gnasher has turned against him and has to use all his heartfelt pleas and happy memories to try and win Gnasher back!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep34
programme.desc: Code Of Honor - Keith spends less time working with Team Voltron, which causes friction with his fellow Paladins

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep8
programme.desc: The Dark Side Of The Moose: Chapter Three - A super-powered Rocky almost defeats Fearless Leader, but accidentally overdoes it, driving Fearless Leader to take his powers into space for the ultimate space take-over-the-world evil plan

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep10
programme.desc: Fake Ravine - When the Dinotrux settle together in the crater, D-Structs decides to go after their most important resource: the Reptools.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep10
programme.desc: Yukon Do It! - Arf gets a chance to run with real sled dogs when he travels with Wally and Wenda to wintry northern Canada to deliver an important package to Wizard Whitebeard, who is off watching the Northern Lights with a fellow wizard.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep65
programme.desc: Welcome Back Otter - Abigail puts herself at risk to reunite an orphaned otter with his family. But the school veterinarian insists the animal will be safer at the zoo.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep10
programme.desc: Remote Out Of Control / Critter Comfort - Biggie takes Branchs superpowered remote but must return it before Branch finds outWhen Poppy builds a new home for a group of cute critters she accidentally attracts their predators.

programme.desc: For Whom The Bell Gods Toll - King Julien accidentally blows himself up and must stand trial to be awarded a second chance; Mort battles Morticus Khan for control of the Mort army

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep10
programme.desc: Oh'S Party Of Slumber / Paranoid Activity - Oh throws a slumber party to take his friendship game to the next level with Tip's classmates/Kyle will do whatever it takes to keep Oh accident-free.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep36
programme.desc: Pirate Booty - After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf
