programme.desc: Between A Rock And A Hard Place - When Hiccup and the Riders discover that Viggo is using two captured Catastrophic Quakens to build a dragon prison, they must help the dragons escape.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep17
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Bath - Pat must deliver an old bath tub to Pencaster Lighthouse. But when he goes to collect it from Thompson Ground, the bath ends up rolling away into Greendale with Jess inside! When Pat catches up with the bath he finds PC Selby about to impound it for being an un-road-worthy vehicle. Pat explains it's a Special Delivery and at last gets on his way. But when he arrives in Pencaster Bay, Micawber and Jess between them manage to loosen the rope tying up the SDS Boat and it goes chugging off to sea with no one on board! So Pat and Jess use the bath as a boat and paddle out to rescue the boat then at last deliver the old bath to Chris. SDS Mission accomplished - mioaw!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep18
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Loch Ness Monster - Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.desc: Big Truck Pups Save the Bridge - Ryder and the Pups team up with Al to save Adventure Bay's big bridge from collapsing.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep906
programme.desc: Big Truck Pups Stop a Flood - The Paw Patrol use their new Big Trucks and the help of their new pup pal Al to repair a dam before Adventure Bay is flooded.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Deep Freeze / The Trojan Seahorse - The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger / Pups Save A Royal Painting - When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Paddington Finds A Pigeon / Paddington and Chores List - Paddington nurses a sick bird named Pigeonton back to health, but can he let him go? // The family all have chores except Paddington. So as not to be excluded, Mr. Brown creates a list for him to follow, but Paddington picks up the wrong list.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep141
programme.desc: King for a Day - Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep142
programme.desc: The Vegetable Pie - Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Our New Neighbor! - Josh and Blue have some BIG news--a new neighbor just moved in next door... it's Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live amongst them, and earn their tree badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep11
programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels stumble upon some of Duggee's old radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep42
programme.desc: Floating Farms, Bangladesh - Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep43
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Dream Team Trouble - After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep25
programme.desc: On and Off - Kit and Pup are at the swimming pool. Can you see who is on the lilo and who is off the lilo? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators balance foam bricks on a toy donkey.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep19
programme.desc: Feather - Dee encourages a friend to say `feather', and goes on a whirlwind word adventure. They see lots of different types of feathers: a grey feather, a spotty feather, a fluffy feather and a unicorn feather.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep97
programme.desc: Treasure Trail - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa‐Laa and Po follow a trail of flowers which leads them to some very special treasure.

programme.title: Clangers (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: Small's Big Surprise - It's Small's birthday. But the present he gets is not quite what he was expecting.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep24
programme.desc: The Thing That Broke - The Dinopaws invent the best game ever - bigging and rounding.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: Wet Paint - Tinpo discovers a way to get around the wet floor in the garage to retrieve the newly painted Vehi-Tools before it rains.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: Silence for Stan - When Stan is sick and resting in bed, Monty tries to find a quiet game to play but wonders if all the best games are noisy.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: Do Elephants Forget - After he forgets to do his chores and empty his lunchbox, Monty wonders if it's possible for someone to remember everything.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep15
programme.desc: Will You Please Stop Messing About - Charlie can only watch his favourite TV show after he and Lola have done some little jobs for Mum and Dad, but Lola can't help but get distracted.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep16
programme.desc: I Completely Know About Guinea Pigs - Lola is chosen to look after the class guinea pig for the holidays. She tries to make sure she knows everything about guinea pigs, but does she?

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: Blown Away - It's too windy for umbrellas and hats but not too windy for Nelly and Nora.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: One Boot Off - Nelly and Nora help Oliver rescue his boot from a muddy puddle.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep4

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: Train Fudge - Sarah and Duck take an unexpected train trip whilst on their quest to buy some fudge.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S14) Ep7
programme.desc: Henry's Health and Safety - Henry causes chaos after talking to Victor about health and safety.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep17

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: Dog Loves Dog Loves Books - Dog finds the original book that starts all of his adventures. He shows Pug how he started the bookshop and how he read all the books so he could recommend which books each customer should read.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep12
programme.desc: The Opposites Badge - The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with a little bit of help from a lot of topsy-turvy animal friends!

programme.desc: Life Insurance / Burst Your Bubble - After a misunderstanding, SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their life insurance protects them from any danger! // When SpongeBob blows himself a bubble boat, everyone in town wants one! Everyone except Mrs. Puff, that is.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep421
programme.desc: On Thin Ice / Room and Hoard - Lynn's extreme sports superstitions cause chaos at a professional hockey match. // Unable to part with their childhood toys, the kids try to convince Mom and Dad that they still play with them.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep422
programme.desc: A Star is Scorned / Senior Moment - Lori regrets everything she hasn't done in high school, and vows to make up for lost time in her senior year. // When Lola realizes that double the cuteness could help her break into show business, she teams up with Lily.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Strife Coach / Gossip Girl - Ronnie Anne and her friends help get Mrs. Kernicky hired as the new PE coach, but her classes are no joke! // When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Going Overboard / Walk Don't Run - Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep90
programme.desc: A Flea In Her Dome / Donut Of Shame / The Krusty Plate - SpongeBob and Patrick try to help Sandy rid her Tree Dome of fleas. // When Patrick accidentally takes SpongeBob’s donut he is wracked with guilt over his crime. // SpongeBob battles a persistent speck of food that is on a plate.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep91
programme.desc: Goo Goo Gas / Le Big Switch - Plankton creates a gas that turns everyone at the Krusty Krab into babies. // After being enrolled in a chef exchange program, SpongeBob switches places with a snooty French chef from a high-end restaurant.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep191
programme.desc: The Executive Treatment - While trying to order a special sandwich, Patrick gets swept up in the fast paced world of business.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109
programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Radioactive Cat - Bose's Mom, Celia, picks up Schwoz's lost radioactive cat from outside SW.A.G. and takes it home, so Danger Force and Captain Man have to try and get it back before she goes nuclear.

programme.title: Henry Danger S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Secret Beef - With an invitation to Swellview's most exclusive restaurant, Henry decides to bring his boss, Ray, but finds it more complicated than expected.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Sitting Bull / The Spies Who Love Me - The older sisters reluctantly let Lynn into their babysitting club but she quickly proves to be too aggressive. // Ronnie Anne wants to go downtown. But her grandparents think it's too dangerous, so they decide to spy on her.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Really Loud Music - Hoping to win a song-writing contest, Luna contemplates whether she should go with a song that's true to her sound or try to make something that the whole world will love.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep151
programme.desc: New Fish in Town / Love That Squid - A new neighbor moves in and becomes Squidward’s best friend. // SpongeBob helps Squidward prepare for a date.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep152
programme.desc: Big Sister Sam / Perfect Chemistry - Patrick's big sister Samantha comes for a visit. // Sandy and Plankton bond over their shared love.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep112

programme.desc: Roger 3000/The Cake/The Big Test/The Joystick/The Lie/Be Brave/The Terror - Fatou absolutely has to play with Roger who is really busy. So to get some peace and quiet the alien constructs a clone playmate-robot he calls: Roger 3000. Things quickly get out of hand though because now that he considers himself to be Fatou’s super-best friend, Roger 3000 has no intentions of sharing her with anyone…especially not the real Roger!

programme.desc: Busy Buddies/Is There A Doc In The Mouse/Night Before Christmas/That's My Mommy/Snowbody Loves Me/Love that Pup/Down Beat Bear/Cat Concerto - Tom and Jerry try to protect a precocious baby when he wanders around the house.

programme.desc: Eyes Wide Open/Dances with Fleas/Guano Scooter/Reducing Your Pawprint/Tiki To The Limit/The Friendship Letter/The Recruit/Where Is My Phone? - Hoodie has an eye infection and must wear a special protective bubble. programme.title: History Uncovered
programme.desc: "The Siege of Osaka" folding screen contains graphic images of suffering not found in similar works of its era. Professor Frederik Cryns uncovers the secrets of who painted it, and why.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.desc: Nishijin-ori, beauty synthesized in a Kyoto brocade. Dive deep into the beauty of the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.desc: Stories about people, stories about life. Intimate portraits of people from around Japan, each leading diverse lives while enriching lives of others.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Kagai, Kyoto's entertainment district where elegant dreams bloom. Dive deep into the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: A travel show focused on the great nature of Japan's northern land, Hokkaido. We visit exquisite locations and present a wealth of great images from NHK 's archives.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream
programme.desc: This program focuses on the latest Japanese business trends, corporate strategies and technologies. We look behind the scenes and discuss their global impact from various perspectives.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-8.

programme.title: Danko & Danta: Accessory Box
programme.desc: Cardboard girl Danko, her friend Danta, and craft master Mr. Snips team up to make cool things out of cardboard. In this episode, it's an accessory box. Why not make your own special box?

programme.title: Doki Doki! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: This time we introduce "A Cat's Eye View of Japan." A 5 minutes program presenting beautiful landscapes in Japan through the eyes of cats. The scenes are filmed by Iwago Mitsuaki.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: As right-hand man to a French master, this legendary patissier dazzled the world! After closing his highly popular shop, what inspired him to return? Behind the legend is a story of profound flavor.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: On a pilgrimage down sacred trails, follow a kitty through a majestic forest. Meet a hunting master at a 1,300-year-old temple, and wait patiently for homemade bread at a seaside cafe.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NHK Documentary
programme.desc: Among the victims of the Hiroshima atom bomb, first year junior high school students stand out for the hugely disproportionate fatalities sustained. We investigate the tragedy of this lost generation.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Established as a fortress city during the Spanish colonial period, Manila is the capital of the Philippines. In this episode, we explore the city, which is changing due to its developing economy.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NHK Drama Showcase
programme.desc: Watch the latest J-dramas, which offers everything from romance, comedy, and sci-fi to gritty shows. Discover how the latest Japanese actors and creators bring dramas to life in fresh new ways.

programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. programme.title: UFC Connected Ep512BattlegroundsMarquezMMAFrontRowAjamainSterlingCoachesCornerEricNicksick
programme.desc: John Marquez and Daniel Gracie give us an exclusive look into what makes Marquez MMA and their partnership so special in this episode of Battlegrounds. We go front row with current Bantamweight Champion Aljamain Sterling at UFC 276 as he watches the third featherweight title fight between Alex Volkanovski vs and Max Holloway. Xtreme Couture’s head coach Eric Nicksick opens up about how coaching fighters gave him a second chance.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Mitchell vs. Evloev
programme.desc: Prelims - Strawweights intent on making their case for a world title shot in 2023 collide at the APEX in Las Vegas, as Top Five contender Marina Rodriguez battles fellow Brazilian standout Amanda Lemos in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in her last five, Rodriguez’ bonus-winning victories over Amanda Ribas and Mackenzie Dern have made her a fan favorite heading into her showdown with Lemos, who is coming off a Performance of the Night submission win over Michelle Waterson in July. Plus, top-flight welterweights square off in the co-main event, with Neil Magny taking on Daniel Rodriguez.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Mitchell vs. Evloev
programme.desc: Main Event - Strawweights intent on making their case for a world title shot in 2023 collide at the APEX in Las Vegas, as Top Five contender Marina Rodriguez battles fellow Brazilian standout Amanda Lemos in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in her last five, Rodriguez’ bonus-winning victories over Amanda Ribas and Mackenzie Dern have made her a fan favorite heading into her showdown with Lemos, who is coming off a Performance of the Night submission win over Michelle Waterson in July. Plus, top-flight welterweights square off in the co-main event, with Neil Magny taking on Daniel Rodriguez.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Mitchell vs. Evloev
programme.desc: Prelims - Strawweights intent on making their case for a world title shot in 2023 collide at the APEX in Las Vegas, as Top Five contender Marina Rodriguez battles fellow Brazilian standout Amanda Lemos in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in her last five, Rodriguez’ bonus-winning victories over Amanda Ribas and Mackenzie Dern have made her a fan favorite heading into her showdown with Lemos, who is coming off a Performance of the Night submission win over Michelle Waterson in July. Plus, top-flight welterweights square off in the co-main event, with Neil Magny taking on Daniel Rodriguez.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Mitchell vs. Evloev
programme.desc: Main Event - Strawweights intent on making their case for a world title shot in 2023 collide at the APEX in Las Vegas, as Top Five contender Marina Rodriguez battles fellow Brazilian standout Amanda Lemos in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in her last five, Rodriguez’ bonus-winning victories over Amanda Ribas and Mackenzie Dern have made her a fan favorite heading into her showdown with Lemos, who is coming off a Performance of the Night submission win over Michelle Waterson in July. Plus, top-flight welterweights square off in the co-main event, with Neil Magny taking on Daniel Rodriguez.
